name: European Pensions and Property Asset Release Group
goal: EPPARG seeks to foster dialogue between industry, EU institutions and governments on innovative pensions and property asset release solutions.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives:
European policies affecting pensions and property asset release, in the areas of such as EU pensions policy, Green Paper on retail financial services and insurance, Capital Markets Union initiative, and Solvency II which affects funding of property asset release.

The specific activities undertaken by EPPARG in relation to the above include:

- contacting European Commission officials and MEPs to understand the impact of the above initiatives on the growth of property asset release in Europe and explaining its contribution to the long term pensions challenge and Capital Markets Union project

- preparing letters and position papers to promote the growth of property asset release markets in Europe and identifying barriers, and sending to MEPs and European Commission officials

- responding to European Commission consultation exercises (eg consultation on Capital Markets Union).
